name: Skillsoft
description: Skillsoft is a global leader in corporate digital learning, focused on transforming today’s workforce for tomorrow’s economy. The Company provides enterprise learning solutions designed to prepare organizations for the future of work, overcome critical skill gaps, drive demonstrable behavior-change, and unlock the potential in their people.Like our customers, we’re always evolving – making sure individuals, teams, and enterprises have exactly what they need to unleash their edge.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Rapidly Develop Skills to Close any Gap
ShortDescription: Skillsoft is Leading e-learning platform, offering diverse courses for professional development, fostering skills and knowledge across industries worldwide.

Highlights.name: Transformative leadership Development Program
Highlights.description: Combine Business Skills With Application To Drive True Behavioral Change

Highlights.name: Close Skills Gaps With Personalized Learning
Highlights.description: From beginner-friendly courses to expert-led, advanced live sessions, our curriculum helps learners at every stage of their career build the skills they and their organizations need.

Highlights.name: Customized Corporate Sustainability Training For Your Organization
Highlights.description: Is your organization looking to address the challenges posed by climate change, resource depletion, and social inequality?

enhanced_description: Skillsoft is a global leader in corporate digital learning and an e-learning platform focused on transforming today’s workforce and accelerating skill development to overcome critical skill gaps. It provides enterprise learning solutions, including transformative leadership development programs, personalized learning paths, and customized corporate sustainability training, designed to drive demonstrable behavior-change and unlock the potential in people. The platform offers a diverse curriculum, from beginner-friendly courses to expert-led advanced live sessions, supporting learners at every career stage in building essential skills. Key features include a Scholarship Program for Employee Dependents and Family Access to Percipio, fostering a continuous learning environment and enhancing training effectiveness.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Closing critical skill gaps within the workforce
Transformative leadership development and behavioral change
Fostering continuous professional development and knowledge acquisition
competitive_advantages: Global leadership position in corporate digital learning
Offering a Scholarship Program for Employee Dependents
Providing Family Access to Percipio learning content
Focus on personalized learning to address specific skill gaps
Ability to customize corporate sustainability training
Leadership development programs designed to drive true behavioral change through practical application
roi_benefits: Improved workforce preparedness for future economic demands
Reduced critical skill gaps within the organization
Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
Demonstrable behavioral change among employees, especially in leadership
Increased training effectiveness and learning retention
